set(THIS_PROJECT CryScriptSystem)

project( ${THIS_PROJECT} )

#START-FILE-LIST
# File List auto generated by waf2cmake.py, do not modify manually.

set (SourceGroup_HeaderFiles
	FunctionHandler.h
	LuaDebugger/GoToFuncWnd.h
	LuaDebuggerResource.h
	ScriptSystem.h
	ScriptTable.h
	StackGuard.h
	resource.h
)
source_group("Header Files" FILES ${SourceGroup_HeaderFiles})


set (SourceGroup_LuaDebugger
	LuaDebugger/AboutWnd.h
	LuaDebugger/Coverage.cpp
	LuaDebugger/Coverage.h
	LuaDebugger/FileTree.cpp
	LuaDebugger/FileTree.h

	LuaDebugger/LUADBG.cpp

	LuaDebugger/_TinyCoolEdit.h
	LuaDebugger/_TinyFileEnum.h
	LuaDebugger/_TinyImageList.h
	LuaDebugger/_TinyMain.h
	LuaDebugger/_TinyRegistry.h
	LuaDebugger/_TinySplitter.h
	LuaDebugger/_TinyStatusBar.h
	LuaDebugger/_TinyTreeList.h
	LuaDebugger/_TinyWindow.h
)
source_group("LuaDebugger" FILES ${SourceGroup_LuaDebugger})


set (SourceGroup_LuaRemoteDebug
	LuaRemoteDebug/LuaRemoteDebug.cpp
	LuaRemoteDebug/LuaRemoteDebug.h
	LuaRemoteDebug/SerializationHelper.h
)
source_group("LuaRemoteDebug" FILES ${SourceGroup_LuaRemoteDebug})


set (SourceGroup_ResourceFiles
	LuaDebugger.rc
	LuaDebugger/LUADBG.ico
	LuaDebugger/res/TreeView.bmp
	LuaDebugger/res/toolbar1.bmp
	LuaDebugger/small.ico
)
source_group("Resource Files" FILES ${SourceGroup_ResourceFiles})


set (SourceGroup_Root
	StdAfx.cpp
	StdAfx.h
)


set (SourceGroup_ScriptBindings
	ScriptBindings/ScriptBind_Movie.cpp
	ScriptBindings/ScriptBind_Movie.h
	ScriptBindings/ScriptBind_Particle.cpp
	ScriptBindings/ScriptBind_Particle.h
	ScriptBindings/ScriptBind_Physics.cpp
	ScriptBindings/ScriptBind_Physics.h
	ScriptBindings/ScriptBind_Script.cpp

	ScriptBindings/ScriptBind_Sound.cpp
	ScriptBindings/ScriptBind_Sound.h

	ScriptBindings/ScriptBind_System.h
	ScriptBindings/ScriptBinding.cpp
	ScriptBindings/ScriptBinding.h
	ScriptBindings/SurfaceTypes.cpp
	ScriptBindings/SurfaceTypes.h
)
source_group("ScriptBindings" FILES ${SourceGroup_ScriptBindings})


set (SourceGroup_SourceFiles
	BucketAllocator.h
	CryScriptSystem.cpp
	FunctionHandler.cpp
	ScriptSystem.cpp
	ScriptTable.cpp
	ScriptTimerMgr.cpp
	ScriptTimerMgr.h
	vectorlib.c
)
source_group("Source Files" FILES ${SourceGroup_SourceFiles})


# Support unity build with uber files
set(CryScriptSystem_uber_0_cpp ${SourceGroup_HeaderFiles} ${SourceGroup_LuaDebugger} ${SourceGroup_LuaRemoteDebug} ${SourceGroup_ResourceFiles} ${SourceGroup_ScriptBindings}  )
enable_unity_build( "CryScriptSystem_uber_0.cpp" CryScriptSystem_uber_0_cpp )

set(NoUberFile ${SourceGroup_Root} ${SourceGroup_SourceFiles}  )


set (SOURCES
	${CryScriptSystem_uber_0_cpp}
	${NoUberFile}
)
#END-FILE-LIST


include_directories( ${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR} )
include_directories( ${SDK_DIR}/Lua/src )

add_library( ${THIS_PROJECT} ${SOURCES})
target_link_libraries(${THIS_PROJECT} lua)

USE_MSVC_PRECOMPILED_HEADER( ${THIS_PROJECT} "StdAfx.h" "StdAfx.cpp" )

SET_PLATFORM_TARGET_PROPERTIES( ${THIS_PROJECT} )
